title: GE Profile Over-The-Range Convection Microwave Oven - PVM9179SKSS
description:
GE Profile Over-The-Range Convection Microwave Oven - PVM9179SKSS

Features:

Sensor Cooking Controls
Automatically adjusts time and power for delicious cooking results


Chef Connect
Three options with a single touch. For instant convenience, choose when to automatically sync clocks and the range elements with the microwave's surface light and vent

1.7 cu. ft. capacity
950 Watts (IEC-705 test procedure)

Fast Cook
Convection and microwave cooking combine to deliver fast oven-quality results

LED cooktop lighting
Brighten the kitchen while saving on energy and maintenance costs

Easy clean enamel interior
Makes cleaning spills and splatters a snap

Convection rack
Achieve golden-brown results with a specially designed rack that allows air to circulate around foods for even heat distribution during convection cooking
